title.rendered: Maxime Simoens S/S 2023 – Paris Fashion Week

content.rendered: Maxime Simoens Spring/Summer 2023 collection is inspired by different species of flowers, with an emphasis on roses. With relaxed and elegant styles, the jackets, tops and pants are genderless and oversize. This season, the designer played with soft fabrics with both prints and solid colors. The pants / shirts sets create a modern balance between contemporary style and the vacation/resort dressing. At the core of the brand DNA, upcycling plays an important part of the collection as the designer deconstruct suits and denim wear from his archives, giving life to new pieces.

excerpt.rendered: Maxime Simoens Spring/Summer 2023 collection is inspired by different species of flowers, with an emphasis on roses….
